title: India, Bhutan explore setting up of new hydropower projects
description: PM Modi and Bhutan's Tobgay collaborate on new energy projects, including the Punatsangchhu-II hydropower project. They seek Indian entity partnerships for revenue generation, financing, and power sales facilitation in Bhutan.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
